description:
When Riki suffers another narcolepsy attack, Kurugaya looks after him until he wakes up. As the two reminisce about the times they`ve spent with their friends and voice their wishes that these times would last forever, there`s a rather nice mood about them...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It Was Raining Back Then, Too
La pluie tombait aussi à ce moment-là
Sono Toki mo Ame ga Futte Ita
そのときも雨が降っていた
